Name: Siddaramaiah
Tweet: Dear PM Modi ಅವರೇ,   Thank you for finally breaking your silence on Mahadayi.  Would’ve been grateful had you replied to the letters urging you to invite CMs of Goa, Maharashtra & Karnataka for a dialogue.   Is your concern for farmers real or a ‘Chunavi Jumla’?   #NijaHeliModi  https://t.co/GQ34OJTU2Q
